txt.en: If you wish to visit the festival, the celebrations can be found in the homes of the Elves, dwarves, Men, and Shire-folk.\n\nIn Ered Luin, the Elves hold their event in Duillond, while the dwarves go to the Inn at Thorin's Hall. Men celebrate in the fields north of Bree, and the hobbits always visit the Party Tree in Hobbiton. All are welcome!
